value.title: CES 2022: Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra Solves The Biggest Problem With Robot Mops
value.excerpt: Roborock has finally announced their latest robovac/mop and I couldn't be more excited. As much as I loved the Roborock S7 last year for its improved mopping capabilities and dock compatibility, it lacked the AI obstacle recognition of the S6 MaxV.

value.title: John Deere's Self-Driving Tractor Stirs Debate on AI in Farming

value.title: Seoul Robotics Announces LiDAR Enabled Autonomous Logistics Platform
value.excerpt: The task of transporting cars at the end of the assembly line to its final destination is currently a manual and expensive logistics problem. Seoul Robotics has implemented a LIDAR enabled automation platform to address at BMW Munich plant.

value.title: Machine-Learning Program Connects to Human Brain and Commands Robots
value.excerpt: Researchers at Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne have developed a machine-learning program that can be connected to a human brain and used to command a robot. The program can alter the robot’s movements based on electrical signals from the brain.
